scripts.deploy:frontend: npm --prefix frontend run build:prod && cd frontend/dist/frontend/browser && copy index.html 404.html && git init && git add . && git commit -m "Deploy to gh-pages" && git push --force https://github.com/Yuri3K/fresh-ok.git master:gh-pages
scripts.deploy:backend: git subtree push --prefix backend render master
scripts.deploy:media: git subtree push --prefix fresh-ok-media media master
